channel.title: Server on htr3n's

item.title: Apache httpd 2.4 and PHP 7 in macOS
item.description: Together, Apache HTTP server, PHP, and MySQL form a powerful and popular combination for Web development. MacOS are often shipped with pre-installed versions of Apache HTTP server and PHP but these are often outdated and merely customised for macOS.
